## About Opera
Opera represents a next-generation web browsing experience that integrates essential online tools directly into the browser interface. With a focus on privacy, efficiency, and user convenience, Opera eliminates the need for multiple extensions by incorporating features like VPN, ad blocking, and social messaging directly into the core browsing experience. The browser's sleek, modern interface and innovative sidebar provide quick access to frequently used services without cluttering the main browsing window.

The desktop application delivers optimal performance on both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring a built-in crypto wallet, battery saver mode, and Workspaces for organizing tabs by project or topic. Opera's Flow feature enables seamless synchronization of files, notes, and links between desktop and mobile devices, creating a unified browsing experience across all platforms. With support for Chrome extensions and advanced customization options, Opera maintains compatibility with the modern web while offering unique features that enhance productivity and privacy.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
*   64-bit processor
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space
